title: The 25 most valuable brands worldwide 2020
yAxis: Brand value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value in million U.S. dollars for 25 number of Brands.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is highest at Brand Amazon and lowest at Brand Volkswagen.
There is a difference of 175894.0 between the maximum Brand Amazon and minimum Brand Volkswagen.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value in million U.S. dollars for 25 number of Brands.
The maximum Brand value in million U.S. dollars 220791.0 is found at Brand Amazon and the minimum is found at Volkswagen where Brand is 44897.0.

The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is highest at Brand Amazon and lowest at Brand Volkswagen.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value in million U.S. dollars for 25 number of Brands.
The maximum Brand value in million U.S. dollars 220791.0 is found at Brand Amazon and the minimum is found at Volkswagen where Brand is 44897.0.
There is a difference of 175894.0 between the maximum Brand Amazon and minimum Brand Volkswagen.
Brand value in million U.S. dollars at Brand Amazon is 220791.0 , second place is Google at 159722.0, and thirdly is Apple at 140524.0.
The lowest value 44897.0 at Volkswagen is almost 2.87 times smaller than the average value 76984.16.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is 1924604.0 if we add up values of all Brands.
